kick.reply:
`\`👢\` ${member.toString()} has been kicked from the server.${reason ? `

> Reason: \`${reason}\``: ''}`

lock.reply:
`\`🔒\` ${channel.toString()} has been locked.

> Use \`/unlock\` to unlock it.`

mute.reply:
`🔇 ${member.toString()} has been muted.

> Use \`/unmute\` to unmute.`

modal1.title: What feature do you want to configure?

option1.label: Channels
option1.description: REQUIRED - Configure the channels used by the bot.

option2.label: Join to Create
option2.description: OPTIONAL - Lighten your voice channels with just one

option3.label: Role Claim
option3.description: OPTIONAL - Let users claim roles from a message

logsEnabled.reply:
`**Logs enabled:**${spelledValues}

> To log \`Kick\`, \`Ban\`, \`Mute\` commands, it is **necessary** to use the **commands given by Stealthy** (\`/kick\`, \`/ban\` & \`/mute\`)`

setupLanguageThird.reply: `Done, your language is now set to **${key.toUpperCase()}** ${value}`

lang.reply: `Good, so you want to ${defaultLanguage !== 'en' ? 'change' : 'set up'} your language.`

channels.reply:
`${logsChannel ? `> **\`🚀\` Logs** channel is setup in <#${logsChannel}>. 
`: ''} ${roleclaimChannel ? `> **\`🗂️\` Role claim** channel is setup in <#${roleclaimChannel}>. 
`: ''} ${membercountChannel ? `> **\`🧾\` Member count** channel is setup in **${membercountChannel.parent ? `<#${membercountChannel.parentId}>`: 'default'}** category. 
`: ''} ${JTCChannel ? `> **\`🔊\` Join to Create** channel is setup in **${JTCChannel.parent ? `<#${JTCChannel.parentId}>` : 'default'}** category. 
`: ''}
Please use, \`/setup channels\` command to setup your channels.`

jtc.reply1:
`\`🔊\` **Join to Create** is a feature that **cleans up the voice channel space**, by making use of a **single channel to generate new voice channels**.

> JTC channel ${findChannel.toString()} is currently setup in **${findChannel.parent ? findChannel.parent.toString() : 'default'}** category.

Please use the **buttons below** to **edit** this feature.`
jtc.reply2:
`\`🔊\` **Join to Create** is a feature that **cleans up the voice channel space**, by making use of a **single channel to generate new voice channels**.

> You can also use \`/setup channels\` to choose a different category than **${noParent ? 'the default one' : firstCategory.name}**.`

blacklist.reply1:
`🛡️` Blacklist feature is disabled

> Would you like to activate it?

roleclaim.reply1:
`\`🗂️\` **Role Claim** is a feature that lets server **users pick a specific role by adding a reaction** to a message.
Choose the **roles carefully**, to maintain the **security** of your server.

> **Role Claim message** is setup in **<#${channelId}>**.
> To change the roles use, \`/setup roleclaim add|remove\` command.

You can **edit the role claim** system with the **buttons bellow**.`
roleclaim.reply2:
`\`🗂️\` **Role Claim** is a feature that lets server **users pick a specific role by adding a reaction** to a message.
Choose the **roles carefully**, to maintain the **security** of your server.

> You can also use \`/setup channels\` to setup your role claim in a different channel than ${selectMenu.channel.toString()}.`

autorole.reply1:
`\`🎩\` **Auto Role** is a feature that **automatically** gives one or more **roles to a newcomer** on your server.
Choose the **roles carefully**, to maintain the **security** of your server.

> You can use \`/setup autorole add\` to setup this feature.`
autorole.reply2:
`\`🎩\` **Auto Role** is a feature that **automatically** gives one or more **roles to a newcomer** on your server.
Choose the **roles carefully**, to maintain the **security** of your server.

> You can use, \`/setup autorole add|remove\` to edit this feature.

\`🧮\` **Roles** that will be **given to newcomers**: ${autoroleArray.map((r) => `<@&${r}>`).join(', ')}`

option1.label: Blacklist
option1.description: Protect your server against bots, scams, etc.

option2.label: Discord invites suppressor
option2.description: Automatically deletes invitations sent by non-moderators
